title: Wild rice stuffing with apples, currants and bacon
ingredients: ['750ml (1 1/4) pints water, divided', '350ml (12 fl oz) chicken stock', '175g (6 oz) wild rice', '150g (5 oz) bacon', '500g (1 1/4 lb) diced onions', '375g (13 oz) diced celery', '1 tablespoon water', '200g (7 oz) long-grain white rice', '250g (9 oz) currants', '100g (4 oz) dried cherries', '75g (3 oz) dried cranberries', '50g (2 oz) dried apricots', '100g (4 oz) diced, unpeeled apples', '1/2 bunch flat leaf parsley, chopped', '6 tablespoons dried mixed herbs']
